remarks.para: Use this class's property to read the configuration settings from your code.

Place a copy of the WebConfiguration.xsd schema file into Visual Studio's xml schema directory (%ProgramFiles%\Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003\Common7\Packages\schemas\xml for Visual Studio 2003 and (%ProgramFiles%\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\XML\Schemas for Visual Studio 2005 respectivly) to provide IntelliSense for the web.config.

Class.example:
Register the configuration section in the configuration file within the configSections element and create the configuration section for remotion.web. The configSections element must precede all configuration sections.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration>
<configSections> <section name="remotion.web" type="Remotion.Web.Configuration.WebConfiguration, Remotion.Web" /> <!-- Other configuration section registrations. --> </configSections>
<remotion.web xmlns="http://www.re-motion.org/web/configuration"> <!-- The configuration section entries. --> <executionEngine defaultWxeHandler="~/WxeHandler.ashx" enableSessionManagement="true" functionTimeout="20" refreshInterval="10" urlMappingFile="C:\ProjectDirectory\UrlMapping.xml" /> <resources root="res" /> <smartNavigation enableScrolling="true" enableFocusing="true" /> <wcag conformanceLevel="Undefined" debugging="Disabled" /> </remotion.web>
<!-- Other configuration sections. --> </configuration>
